memangin thathparayakata ghana adi 15 k pamana jalayak moragahakanda jalashayata eyi.mema wyapruthiye siyalu katayuthu sandaha siyalu wideshadhara labadimata ratawal gananawak sambandha wi thibe.mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage nayakathwaya yatathe amathi nimal siripala mahathage meheyawimen sidukarana me katayuththata wadima mudala laba dimata katayuthu karamin sitinne japanayayi.ee anuwa moragahakanda siyalu weli jalashaya ha widuli balagarayak sandaha awashya aadhara labadimata japan ‘jayika’ aayathanaya giwisum assan kara thibe.

dimokratik pakshaya kongras mandala mathiwaranaye tharanga wada sitinne rusiyawa kere wada dadi piliwethak anugamanaya karana pakshaya hatiyata pamanak no we; amarikanu adhirajyawadaya udesa kerena yuddhaya rahasigatha saha wiwrutha yana deyakarayen ma kara gena yama udesa kelinma wagakiyayuthu pudgalayan thama apekshakayan saha niyojithayan lesa idiripath kara sitina pakshaya lesa ya.

merata di wadima test kadulu sankhyawak binda hela aththe da was ya.35 hawiridi was shi්ra lanka kandayame palamu ethera test jayaga්rahanaye da niyamuweki. 1995 marthuwe nepiyar hi pawathi ema tharagaye di nawasilantha pile kadulu 10 k ma dawa ganimata ohu samath wiya.ape wega pandu bala aniye pathaka yodhayaku bandu was ekdina tharagayakadi wadima kadulu sankhyawak labagath pandu yawanna lesa da ithihasayata ekwe. 2001 di kolambaa pawathi ema tharagayedi simbabwe pile pithikaruwo 8 denaku ma ohuta goduru wuha.
uurawa, oomarkada pradeshawala pawul sandaha ek pawulakata akkaraya bagin nomile idam labadi thibenne padawiya pradeshiya lekam karyalaya magini.
